project_descr: This project will focus on enhancing productivity of land through sustainable land management of soil and water resources, particularly integrating CSA as a climate change adaptation strategy to build climate change resilient societies.

outputs.output_descr: Enhancing Adoption Of Climate Smart Agriculture Practices in Uganda‘S Farming Systems Project
donor_name: Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA)

document_name: Conduct a Terminal Evaluation of the UNDP/COMESA project on enhancing adoption of Climate Smart Agriculture (CSA) in five districts of Bugiri, Busia, Budaka, Namutumba and Buyende in Uganda
Document lessons learned from implementation of Climate Smart Agriculture (CSA) in five districts of Bugiri, Busia, Budaka, Namutumba and Buyende in Uganda

Individual International Lead Consultant: Terminal Evaluation of the UNDP/COMESA project on enhancing adoption of Climate Smart Agriculture (CSA) in five districts of Bugiri, Busia, Budaka, Namutumba and Buyende in Uganda.
National Consultant to document 4 unique case studies on climate change adaptation practices in Fisheries ad Aquaculture in Lake Victoria Basin
National Consultant to document lessons learned from NAPA pilots and non-NAPA climate change adaptation initiatives
Study to establish livestock mobility patterns nationally and factors influencing sustainable pastoral livelihoods to inform development of a pastoral code
project_title: enhancing adoption of climate smart agriculturein uganda
